p: Acute intraperitoneal administration of Citrus aurantium EO, similar to fluoxetine, increased open arm explorations (percentage of time spent and percentage of entries) in the elevated plus-maze in male mice. The authors suggested that the effect of Citrus aurantium L. is linked to serotonergic transmission based on a fluoxetine + Citrus aurantium EO interaction. However, Citrus aurantium EO did not change the anxiolytic effect of fluoxetine in the elevated plus-maze, suggesting no drug interaction [ 51].
